text:
I regularly use Transferwise to send money from UK to India.
Best features of using Transferwise
- Extremely efficient APP.
Regularly updates and well maintained. Configuring latest technologies like Apple Pay makes it so EASY to make the transfers. Dont have to be dependant on desktops or website to make the transfers.
Effortless it could be made by just a few clicks while travelling!
- Flash speed transfer times
When you initiate a transfer before 12.00 during the day, the money is in your overseas bank out with in an hour! Not joking
- Extra perks.
When you recommend transferwise to your friends, they give you £50 to £100 bonus. Pretty cool ha.
Not to forget. enjoying no transfer fee for the first transaction.!
- BEST conversion rates (BEST one for the last)
Most competitive conversion rates in the market so far. Hands down.
I recommend it to anyone and everyone!! Would give it 100 stars if I could :P
